Condition.Expression: ($IpInstance_PGA_Not_Connected & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_FOLLOWER & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_STANDALONE & $IpInstance_STANDALONE_DAC_INP & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_FOLLOWER_DAC_INP & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_PGA_Not_Connected & $IpInstance_PGA_DAC_INP & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_PGA_INV_IO0 & $IpInstance_PGA & $IpInstance_PGA_DAC_INP & STM32H5) | ($IpInstance_PGA_Connected_non_inverting_with_external_bias_or_inverting_mode & $IpInstance_PGA_INV_IO0_BIAS & $IpInstance_PGA & $IpInstance_PGA_DAC_INP & STM32H5)

RefParameter.Name: SelfCalibration
RefParameter.Description: Self Calibration is not available for LL configuration.

Condition.Expression: UserTrimming = OPAMP_TRIMMING_USER & SelfCalibration = Disable & PowerMode = OPAMP_POWERMODE_NORMAL
UserTrimming = OPAMP_TRIMMING_USER & SelfCalibration = Disable & PowerMode = OPAMP_POWERMODE_NORMAL

RefParameter.Comment: OffSet Trimming Value in High Speed Mode (PMOS)
RefParameter.Name: TrimmingValuePHighSpeed

Condition.Expression: UserTrimming = OPAMP_TRIMMING_USER & SelfCalibration = Disable & PowerMode = OPAMP_POWERMODE_HIGHSPEED

RefParameter.Comment: OffSet Trimming Value in High Speed Mode (PMOS)
RefParameter.Name: TrimmingValuePHighSpeed

RefParameter.Comment: OffSet Trimming Value in High Speed Mode (NMOS)
RefParameter.Name: TrimmingValueNHighSpeed

Condition.Expression: UserTrimming = OPAMP_TRIMMING_USER & SelfCalibration = Disable & PowerMode = OPAMP_POWERMODE_HIGHSPEED

RefParameter.Comment: OffSet Trimming Value in High Speed Mode (NMOS)
RefParameter.Name: TrimmingValueNHighSpeed

Condition.Diagnostic:
Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to dedicated IO pin.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is internally connected to the OPAMP output.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out1 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is internally connected to the OPAMP output.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is internally connected to the OPAMP output.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC1 channel out1 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC1 channel out1 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC1 channel out1 with internal connection is enabled. The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input or bias.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when HRTIMER External Event is set as source for OPAMP.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected externally on IO pin.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors for input or bias for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is redirected to HRTIM event source (on dedicated IO pin, signal is no more analog but digital).

Only active when DAC1 channel out2 with internal connection is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.

Only active when DAC1 channel out1 with internal connection is enabled.
The non-inverting input VINP is connected internally to the dedicated DAC output.
The inverting input VINM is connected to the OPAMP output with a feedback resistors with VINM0 pin for input or bias and VINM1 pin for filtering.
The OPAMP output VOUT is connected to a dedicated IO pin.
OPAMP IP can be selected if ADC IP fast mode is not selected
